text:
Two metal boxes containing air are standing in a room. Box X is on top of a heater. Box Y is ona
bench. The boxes are left for a long time.

  

 

heater bench

Which line in the table best describes the average speed of the molecules in the containers?

 

 

 

 

box X | box Y
A fast zero
B fast slow
C | slow fast
D | zero fast
